name: Cookie Crumble (0-Dawg)
description:
Looks like the peaceful town of Sweetville is under attack by the gluttonous Karen. Villagers of Sweetville are in disarray and are fleeing  from the vile beast. Gingy is caught up in the rampage is trying to make his way back home. Gingy must avoid various obstacles like utensils, milk, and various fruits.  Can Gingy sprint and vault across SweetVille to get back home or will he get devoured by Karen?

This game was made during MidJam2021, theme was Can't Stop. This game was made by 5 participating members.
